HEBREW: וְכֹ֣ל ׀ אִ֣ישׁ יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל קָ֚מוּ מִמְּקוֹמ֔וֹ וַיַּעַרְכ֖וּ בְּבַ֣עַל תָּמָ֑ר וְאֹרֵ֧ב יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל מֵגִ֥יחַ מִמְּקֹמ֖וֹ מִמַּֽעֲרֵה־גָֽבַע׃
ENGLISH: And all the men of Yisra᾽el rose up out of their place, and put themselves in array at Ba῾al-tamar: and the liers in wait of Yisra᾽el rushed out of their places, out of Ma῾are-geva.
